mapper.insert: insert into user(user_id, user_name, user_password, permission,phone,email,birth_date,balance) values (#{userID}, #{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{permission},#{phone},#{email},#{birthDate},#{balance})
mapper.update: update user set balance=#{balance} where user_id=#{userID}
mapper.select: select * from user where user_id=#{userID} and user_password=#{userPassword}
